title: Coconut by Meta AI – Better LLM Reasoning with Chain of Continuous Thought?
dot:
digraph LLM_Reasoning{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];Introduction[label="Introduction
- LLMs show reasoning abilities
- CoT method: step-by-step reasoning in words
- Question: Should AI translate thoughts to words?"]; CoT[label="Chain-of-Thought (CoT) Method
- Starts with a question
- Generates reasoning in words
- Repetitive forward passes to generate final answer"]; COCONUT[label="Chain of Continuous Thought (COCONUT) Method
- Alternates between language mode and latent thought mode
- Uses last hidden state as input for next step
- Special tokens <bot> and <eot> to mark modes"]; Training[label="Training Procedure
- Multi-stage training using existing CoT data
- Introduces thought tokens gradually
- Loss calculated on remaining reasoning steps, not thought tokens"]; Strategies[label="Switching Strategies
- Binary classifier for switching modes
- Constant number of latent thoughts for simplicity"]; Results[label="Experimental Results
- COCONUT outperforms No-CoT and CoT on various datasets
- More efficient than CoT"]; BFS[label="BFS-like Reasoning
- Latent reasoning aids in planning tasks
- Allows exploration of multiple branches before commitment"]; Conclusion[label="Conclusion
- COCONUT enhances reasoning capabilities
- Future directions: pretraining with continuous thoughts, optimizing efficiency, combining approaches"];Introduction->CoT;Introduction->COCONUT;COCONUT->Training;COCONUT->Strategies;COCONUT->Results;Results->BFS;BFS->Conclusion;}

title: Systems ideas that sound good but almost never work
dot: digraph SoftwareChallenges{rankdir=TB;node[shape=rectangle, style=filled, color=lightgrey, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_legend{label="Common Software Engineering Pitfalls";style=dashed; A[label="Let's just make it pluggable"];B[label="Let's just add an API"];C[label="Let's abstract that one more time"];D[label="Let's make that asynchronous"];E[label="Let's just add access controls later"];F[label="Let's just sync the data"];G[label="Let's make it cross-platform"];H[label="Let's just enable escape to native"];}A->A1[label="Complexity"];A1[label="Pluggability rarely 'just works'"];B->B1[label="Platform challenges"];B1[label="APIs require a full ecosystem"];C->C1[label="Over-abstraction"];C1[label="Too soon or messy later"];D->D1[label="Asynchrony bugs"];D1[label="Hard to reproduce errors"];E->E1[label="Security risks"];E1[label="Access control needs foresight"];F->F1[label="Synchronization issues"];F1[label="Hard problem with data translation"];G->G1[label="Cross-platform challenges"];G1[label="Essentially building an OS/browser"];H->H1[label="State management issues"];H1[label="Framework and native state conflict"];note[shape=note, label="9 out of 10 times these solutions are problematic"];}
